name: verify-me
description: Text-to-Speech and Voice Cloning desktop application

scripts.build:linux: npm run build && cd src-tauri && cargo tauri build --bundles deb,appimage,rpm
scripts.build:windows: npm run build && cd src-tauri && cargo tauri build --bundles msi,nsis
scripts.build:mac: npm run build && cd src-tauri && cargo tauri build --bundles dmg
scripts.build:android: npx cap sync android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease
scripts.build:android:aab: npx cap sync android && cd android && ./gradlew bundleRelease
scripts.build:android:debug: npx cap sync android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug
scripts.dev:android: npx cap sync android && npx cap run android
